## Source: amazon-inspector (e7e18708fe081142405b3e556739484b4ac0ace94ce702284ee12f53190543f3)
The package polycard was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (878ec33e9d1df5f272b86ee3d1f65445e7a1486ad0ca2341bc5f64c455e3fbe8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'polycard' @ 100.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
